item.title: k8s Volumes: HostPath and EmptyDir Explained

item.title: Note for CKA Exam
item.description: Things to turn off before exam> Things to turn off before exam # Bandwidth saving> Bandwidth saving # google drive sync any backgorund updates wifi connection in other devices Prevent from autoupdate> Prevent from autoupdate # software update (mbp, iphone) Others> Others # firewall disable all chrome plugins backup plan> backup plan # sim card - two extra network: EE, giffgaff spare computer (MBP) Tips> Tips # When use wc -> be careful the header, need total - 1> When use wc -> be careful the header, need total - 1 # Store temporary commands / note / result in a fixed location like /root/tmp> Store temporary commands / note / result in a fixed location like /root/tmp # Even in remote host; we use that fixed location to store our results then get back the result from it> Even in remote host; we use that fixed location to store our results then get back the result from it # remote$ cat tmp remote$ exit remote$ exit local$ ssh remote cat tmp Do not use tmux> Do not use tmux # hard to copy and paste and scroll
